description.para: Priority 1 checkpoint 6.3 is not met unless the flag is set. This can be enforced by the configuration entry.

remarks.para: If the button is not used in WAI complient mode, and the page is displayed using Internet Explorer with disabled client script, the click event of last WebButton on the page is fired.
Add a <pages validateRequest="false" /> directive to the configuration if you use more that plain text in the button.
